00020   enum EDoubleLFCValues {k_Constant_DoubleLFC, 
00021                          k_Constant_Error_DoubleLFC,
00022                          k_Constant_Reference_Point_DoubleLFC,
00023                          k_Constant_Reference_Point_Error_DoubleLFC,
00024                          kNDoubleLFCValues};
00025 
00032   class LinearFitConstant : public lcio::LCFixedObject<kNIntLFCValues,
00033                                                        kNFloatLFCValues,
00034                                                        kNDoubleLFCValues> {
00035 
00036   public:
00037 
00038     LinearFitConstant(lcio::LCObject* obj) : lcio::LCFixedObject<kNIntLFCValues,
00039                                                                  kNFloatLFCValues,
00040                                                                  kNDoubleLFCValues
00041                                                                  >(obj),
00042                                              _linearFitSlopeAvailable(false),
00043                                              _linearFitSlope( 1 ) {}
00044 
00045     LinearFitConstant(int ID,
00046                       double constant, 
00047                       double constant_error, 
00048                       double constant_reference_point,
00049                       double constant_reference_point_error ) {
00050 
00051       obj()->setIntVal(k_ID_IntLFC, ID);
00052 
00053       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_DoubleLFC,
00054                           constant);
00055 
00056       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Error_DoubleLFC, 
00057                           constant_error);
00058 
00059       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Reference_Point_DoubleLFC, 
00060                           constant_reference_point);
00061 
00062       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Reference_Point_Error_DoubleLFC, 
00063                           constant_reference_point_error);
00064 
00065     }
00066 
00072     double eval(double x) { 
00073 
00074       if(_linearFitSlopeAvailable) {
00075 
00076         const double y_intercept = 
00077           getConstant() - _linearFitSlope*getConstantReferencePoint();
00078 
00079         return y_intercept + _linearFitSlope * x;
00080 
00081       } else {
00082 
00083         return getConstant();
00084 
00085 //        std::stringstream errorMessage("Slope missing for evaluating fit");
00086 //
00087 //        errorMessage << " with ID: " << getID() << '\n';
00088 //        
00089 //        throw(std::runtime_error(errorMessage.str()));
00090 
00091       }
00092 
00093     }
00094 
00097     int getID() const {
00098 
00099       return getIntVal(k_ID_IntLFC);
00100 
00101     }
00102     
00106     double getConstant() const {
00107 
00108       return getDoubleVal(k_Constant_DoubleLFC);
00109 
00110     }
00111 
00114     double getConstantError() const {
00115 
00116       return getDoubleVal(k_Constant_Error_DoubleLFC);
00117 
00118     }
00119 
00122     double getConstantReferencePoint() const {
00123 
00124       return getDoubleVal(k_Constant_Reference_Point_DoubleLFC);
00125 
00126     }
00127 
00130     double getConstantReferencePointError() const {
00131 
00132       return getDoubleVal(k_Constant_Reference_Point_Error_DoubleLFC);
00133 
00134     }
00135 
00136     
00139     void setID(const int ID) {
00140 
00141       obj()->setIntVal(k_ID_IntLFC, ID);
00142 
00143     }
00144     
00147     void setConstant(const double constant) {
00148 
00149       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_DoubleLFC, constant);
00150 
00151     }
00152

00156 
00157       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Error_DoubleLFC, constantError);
00158 
00159     }
00160 
00161 
00164     void setConstantReferencePoint(const double constantReferencePoint) {
00165 
00166       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Reference_Point_DoubleLFC, 
00167                           constantReferencePoint);
00168 
00169     }
00170 
00173     void setConstantReferencePointError(double constantReferencePointError) {
00174 
00175       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Reference_Point_Error_DoubleLFC, 
00176                           constantReferencePointError);
00177 
00178     }
00179 
00187     void setSlope(double lfs) {
00188 
00189       _linearFitSlope = lfs;
00190 
00191       _linearFitSlopeAvailable = true;
00192 
00193     }

00200     const std::string getTypeName() const {
00201       return "LinearFitConstant";
00202     }
00203     
00209     const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00210       return "i:ID,"
00211              "f:constant,"
00212              "f:constant_error,"
00213              "f:constant_reference_point,"
00214              "f:constant_reference_point_error";
00215     }

00224   inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, 
00225                                   const CALICE::LinearFitConstant& lfr) {
00226 
00227     out << "ID: " << lfr.getID()
00228         << " constant: " << lfr.getConstant()
00229         << " constant error: " << lfr.getConstantError()

00231         << " constant reference point error: " << lfr.getConstantReferencePointError();
